root.name: Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Commander
root.description: Future Soldier Ghost Recon OnlineBy playing Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Commander, players will be able to unlock exclusive items and bonuses giving them a head start when playing Ghost Recon: Future Soldier and Ghost Recon Online. Official press releaseCancellationThe co-founder of Loot Drop, Brenda Romero announced on Twitter on October 29, 2012 that the game had been canceled due to lay-offs at Loot Drop.
